title: Why the F*** the Ultimate skin wasn't given for toplane?
body:
LOL.
I mean, first of all, the MF ultskin doesn't look any special. but the point of this thread is, you've dumpstered Toplane for too long, now you've denied them the right to have a champion with an ultimate skin?

So much disappointment,  and I Was starting to think you guys are becoming somewhat creative.
